title: Create microsoft-stack patterns (4)
description: Create four Microsoft stack patterns: power-query-bronze.pattern.md, power-query-silver.pattern.md, dax-measure.pattern.md, and dataflow-gen2.pattern.md. Each includes technology-specific best practices and common pitfalls.
notes: Created 4 microsoft-stack patterns: power-query-bronze.pattern.md (raw data loading), power-query-silver.pattern.md (data cleaning/standardization), dax-measure.pattern.md (DAX measure creation with VAR pattern), dataflow-gen2.pattern.md (Fabric dataflow configuration).
